translations: v．解开枷锁，释放：从束缚、限制或控制中解放出来。
· The new technology unshackles workers from their desks.
新技术让员工摆脱了对办公桌的束缚。

sentences.sentence: Until agriculture unshackles itself from dependence on oil, gas tanks in rich countries and stomachs in poor countries will be competing to be filled.
sentences.translation: 只有农业摆脱了对石油的依赖，才不会出现穷国的肚皮与富国的油箱争夺石油的现象。
